short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview GitHub link in a nice popup when you hover over it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
> This extension is open sourced: https://github.com/pengqun/github-link-preview

Preview GitHub links in a sleek and informative popup when you hover over them. With GitHub Link Preview, you can instantly see key details about any GitHub repository without leaving the current page. The extension displays the repositoryâ€™s name, description, star & fork, count, and last commit date, providing valuable insights at a glance.

Key Features:

- Quick and easy GitHub link previews with no clicks needed.
- Displays repository name, description, stars, forks, and last commit time.
- Boost API rate limits by providing your own GitHub access token.
- Toggle the link preview popup on or off as needed.

This extension is a must-have for anyone working with GitHub, making your browsing experience more efficient and enjoyable.
